description:
Space travel, the Internet, cryptocurrency - these huge leaps in technology were fueled at least in some part by distrust and fear of others. In this episode, Dalton & Michael debate whether paranoid or conspiratorial thinking can actually help develop legitimate tech.

Apply to Y Combinator: https://yc.link/DandM-apply
Work at a Startup: https://yc.link/DandM-jobs
title: How Paranoid Thinking Can Fuel Technological Advancement
